doc.name: BackDropQueue
doc.author: Yang Zhao, based on Queue by Jie Liu, Christopher Hylands
doc.port: The output port on which the queue size is broadcast. The default type is integer.
The output port on which dropped tokens are broadcast. A token is dropped if the queue size is smaller than the capacity. The default type is the same as the type of the input port.
doc.property: The capacity of the queue. The initial default is an integer of value 1.
